answers.answer: With my frist they  gave me that it was a long waiting and it did nothing so they started me on the drip and that got things going much better

I had to get induced both times with my babies. Idk what pill I had but it thins the cervix and you cant feel that stuff but then I had diff meds in the iv too. And thats the one that makes you have contractions. And some hurt. But the next day they broke my water.. and then epidural and man oh man I needed that. Not much longer I had my baby in about 5 pushes the second one was much easier to give birth to.
Thank you! I'm so nervous. This is my first. I really don't think I'm gonna get any sleep. My mind won't stop racing.

question: Hello! I'm 39w3d and I went to the drs this morning and my Doctor decided to admit me tomorrow night and get me started on cervidil and be induced Friday morning. Anyone else gone thru this with cervidil first? What should I expect? Chain of events? I'm so nervous I'm nauseous! I'm excited to meet my little girl but I wanted to go naturally. But bc of her size and having gestational diabetes he doesn't wanna wait any longer.
title: What should I expect??
